title: External influences
fullText:
Socket-outlets providing site supply to a connectable electrical installation shall be provided with a degree of protection not less than IPX4 in accordance with AS 60529, both when plugs are inserted or removed.
A higher degree of protection shall be provided where specific local environmental conditions such as the presence of nearby fixed sprinklers or a salt or dust laden atmosphere is present. For example, the location of a socket-outlet in proximity to fixed water sprinklers requires a minimum degree of protection of IPX5.
